Room.Name: Top of Gorgon's Tower
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the top parapet of Gorgon's Tower, overlooking the Nyyron Trail.
Room.LongDescription: Although the vines are lush and green on the sides of the tower, nothing lives here on the top. You can hear a bubbling noise below inside the stone tower, and acid vapors rise all about you. There is a closed hatch which appears to be locked with a heart-shaped lock. Some say Gorgon still hides inside, blinded forever by the herbalist who once lived on the farm south of here.
